title: Dutch ex soccer player Edgar Davids sues Riot and wins
body:
Former soccer player Edgar Davids sued Riot for the resemblance of its striker lucian skin, claiming it looks too much like him.
A judge has ruled on David's behalf and demands Riot reveals how much money was made on the skin in The Netherlands, granting him a percentage of the earnings.

Judge for yourself
http://media.nu.nl/m/vgjx21fabs0a_wd640.jpg

The Article
http://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2017-08-14-ex-footballer-edgar-davids-wins-lawsuit-against-league-of-legends-dev-riot-over-lucian-skin

Personally I think Yasuo also looks like Justin Bieber, better delete him while we can..
